title: Blockchain-Based Land Record Management Project (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Land Record Systems, Blockchain Technology Fundamentals, and Data Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Learner Role: Students/job seekers conducting a land records management system improvement project. Domain Expertise: Advanced. Subject Area: Social Studies. Assessment Method: Project-Based Evaluation. Technology Environment: Bring Your Own Device (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of a land record management system utilizing blockchain technology.
Learners can design methods to implement land record abstraction using smart contracts.
Learners can develop a prototype to solve real-world land record management problems through project-based collaborative work.
Learners can evaluate the security and transparency advantages of blockchain-based systems compared to conventional systems.

resources: Blockchain Development Platform (e.g., Hyperledger Fabric, Ethereum)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
